common.create-free-account: Create your free Team Teach Hub account

course-certificate.not-graded-yet: You have not been graded on this course yet. Your certificate will appear here if you receive a passing grade
course-certificate.certificate-footer: The certified individual has undertaken a course in the above subject and has been awarded a certificate from Team team ltd. in accordance with the ICM quality award. Team teach is an accredited, award-winning provider of positive behaviour training, equipping individuals and teams in a variety of settings to support individuals who are distressed and have challenging behaviours in ways that lead to desirable outcomes and positive relationships
course-certificate.certification-valid-until-message: Your certification is valid until {{date, dd/M/yyyy}}
course-certificate.title: CERTIFICATE
course-certificate.levels-limitation-message: The individual named above is not qualified to teach or cascade to others any part of the Team Teach programme.
course-certificate.physical-limitation-message: Physical techniques are not covered under this certification
course-certificate.completed-message: Has successfully completed the following Team teach course:

modify-grade-modal.warning:
Modifications to attendee’s grade will be visible to the trainer, attendee, and
will be reflected on their granted certificate.

course-certificate.certification-code-incorrect: We could not match this certificate number. If this is incorrect, please contact Team Teach.
course-certificate.completed-modules-unavailable: Information on completed modules is unavailable.

modal_ACCEPT.title: Ready to build the course?
modal_ACCEPT.msg: After you have accepted a course, you must confirm the modules and techniques that will be covered.

modal_DECLINE.title: Are you sure you want to decline this course?

book-course.title: Book a course
book-course.notice: Please make sure email(s) is entered correctly. Course registration details will be sent to email address(es).
book-course.review-tnc: I confirm that I wish to participate in the course even if it starts during my 14 day cancellation period. I understand that I will lose my right to cancel the contract once the course is complete and that I must pay for services provided prior to cancellation.
book-course.pay-by-cc-info: Payment by credit card allows you to secure your registration(s) immediately. After you confirm your order you will be taken to a secure page where you can pay online.
book-course.pay-by-inv-info: An invoice will be sent to you requiring payment within 30 days.
book-course.order-success-info: Your order has been successfully submitted.
book-course.order-success-msg: Each attendee will receive an email with the necessary course instructions once this order has been processed and approved.
book-course.payment-cc-subtitle: Enter your card details below and press Pay finalize your order

overview.title: Overview
overview.no-org-assigned: No organizasion assigned to current user.

blog.title: Blog
blog.no-post-id-error: No post ID has been provided

new-course.description: To submit a course, choose from the modules available to create a course {{duration}} hours in duration. Times indicated on the modules are the minimum recommended duration for each.
new-course.submitted-course: You have successfully created your {{name}} Course
new-course.duration-exceeded: You have exceeded the minimum duration for this course, you must remove a module in order to add more.

assign-trainers.lead-error-max: There can be only one Lead trainer
assign-trainers.assist-hint_one: At least one assistant trainer needed

form.health-leaflet-copy: I acknowledge I must send the health and safety leaflet at least 2 weeks before the course begins. (If the course is starting in less than 2 weeks, send as soon as possible before the course begins.)
form.practice-protocol-copy: I acknowledge I will confirm practice protocols and a first aider.
form.valid-id-copy: I acknowledge I will ensure all delegates have a valid form of ID (passport or driving licence) before commencing the training.

grading.title: Grading

grading-details-confirmation.line1: You are now at the end of your course and ready to grade.
grading-details-confirmation.line2: The following details need to be confirmed before grading each attendee individually:
grading-details-confirmation.line3: Confirm an individual’s attendance and that ID checks were completed.
grading-details-confirmation.line4: It is an automatic fail if an individual did not attend.
grading-details-confirmation.line5: Confirm modules and techniques covered or not covered in the course.
grading-details-confirmation.line6: This informs the modules and techniques the attendee will be graded on at an individual level.

grading.description: Grade attendees individually, in multiples, or altogether as a group. Please note, grading details may not be modified once you’ve begun grading.

course-evaluation.signature-desc: Please enter the full name that matches with your account. Your signature confirms the information provided is an accurate representation of your experience.

questions.ISSUES_ARISING_FROM_COURSE: Were there any issues arising from the course?
questions.KEY_STRENGTHS_OF_COURSE: What would you describe as the key strengths of this course?
questions.SUGGESTIONS: What follow up or changes can you suggest to further develop our practice?

course-evaluation.disclaimer: Your ratings and comments are appreciated as the course involves physical participation including attention to Health and Safety issues working within the Team Teach Code of Practice. By completing this evaluation, you consent to Team Teach collecting and processing this data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulations (GDPR). See our Privacy Policy for more.
